textBox.richText: After a couple of very long weeks with very little exercise and (too) many hours in front of the mac - actually when I close my eyes I still see a picture similar to the one above - it is finally done! I can therefore hand in my PhD thesis to the two referees tomorrow with a clean conscience and the hope that they will eventually recommend it for a defense. It's been tough but my plan-everything-in-advance-syndrome has helped me quite a lot the last two months. As you might have realized following my posts here it's been a long tough stretch, but I managed to get everything together in time, and I even have tonight off - it's printed. Now the plan is to do very little the next couple of days to compensate so I don't get completely crazy. After that I will tie up some loose ends before the next stretch of hard work needs to be planned: reading up for the defense-”quiz”... but no need to worry about that for the next couple of weeks - I hope. back to life, back to reality... And still - if you have any hints for what to see/do in Berlin, then drop me a line in a comment here Cheers!
